logic: recovered methane is used for electricity generation, the project activity is also eligible under category I.D.
summary: recovered methane is used for electricity generation, the project activity is also eligible under category I.D.

logic: If the recovered methane is used for heat generation it is also eligible under category I.C.
summary: If the recovered methane is used for heat generation it is also eligible under category I.C.

logic: fraction of time in which the gas is combusted in the flare, multiplied by the efficiency of the flaring process, shall be monitored.
summary: fraction of time in which the gas is combusted in the flare, multiplied by the efficiency of the flaring process, shall be monitored.
